name: Atrocity
desc: At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, boosts damage by 25% of unit's Atk, and after combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 and Special cooldown count+1 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. (No effect on Special cooldown counts already at maximum.)
inherit: This skill can only be equipped by its original unit.
